trans-unit.source: Returns detailed data for a handle returned from InetGet().

seg-source.mrk: Returns detailed data for a handle returned from InetGet().

target.mrk: Returns detailed data for a handle returned from InetGet().

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: [optional] A handle return from InetGet().

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
A handle return from InetGet().

target.mrk: [optional]
A handle return from InetGet().

trans-unit.source: [optional] The index for the data to retrieve. If this value is -1 an array containing all of the below data will be returned.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The index for the data to retrieve.
If this value is -1 an array containing all of the below data will be returned.

target.mrk: [optional]
The index for the data to retrieve.
If this value is -1 an array containing all of the below data will be returned.

trans-unit.source: $INET_DOWNLOADREAD (0) - Bytes read so far (this is updated while the download progresses).

seg-source.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADREAD (0) - Bytes read so far (this is updated while the download progresses).

target.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADREAD (0) - Bytes read so far (this is updated while the download progresses).

trans-unit.source: $INET_DOWNLOADSIZE (1) - The size of the download in bytes (this may not always be present).

seg-source.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADSIZE (1) - The size of the download in bytes (this may not always be present).

target.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADSIZE (1) - The size of the download in bytes (this may not always be present).

trans-unit.source: $INET_DOWNLOADCOMPLETE (2) - Set to True if the download is complete, False if the download is still ongoing.

seg-source.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADCOMPLETE (2) - Set to True if the download is complete, False if the download is still ongoing.

target.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADCOMPLETE (2) - Set to True if the download is complete, False if the download is still ongoing.

trans-unit.source: $INET_DOWNLOADSUCCESS (3) - True if the download was successful. If this is False then the next data member will be non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADSUCCESS (3) - True if the download was successful.
If this is False then the next data member will be non-zero.

target.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADSUCCESS (3) - True if the download was successful.
If this is False then the next data member will be non-zero.

trans-unit.source: $INET_DOWNLOADERROR (4) - The error value for the download. The value itself is arbitrary. Testing that the value is non-zero is sufficient for determining if an error occurred.

seg-source.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADERROR (4) - The error value for the download.
The value itself is arbitrary.
Testing that the value is non-zero is sufficient for determining if an error occurred.

target.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADERROR (4) - The error value for the download.
The value itself is arbitrary.
Testing that the value is non-zero is sufficient for determining if an error occurred.

trans-unit.source: $INET_DOWNLOADEXTENDED (5) - The extended value for the download. The value is arbitrary and is primarily only useful to the AutoIt developers.

seg-source.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADEXTENDED (5) - The extended value for the download.
The value is arbitrary and is primarily only useful to the AutoIt developers.

target.mrk: $INET_DOWNLOADEXTENDED (5) - The extended value for the download.
The value is arbitrary and is primarily only useful to the AutoIt developers.

trans-unit.source: Constants are defined in InetConstants.au3.

seg-source.mrk: Constants are defined in InetConstants.au3.

target.mrk: Constants are defined in InetConstants.au3.

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: the request data.

seg-source.mrk: the request data.

target.mrk: the request data.

trans-unit.source: an empty string and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: an empty string and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: an empty string and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: If called with no arguments then the total number of active downloads will be returned.

seg-source.mrk: If called with no arguments then the total number of active downloads will be returned.

target.mrk: If called with no arguments then the total number of active downloads will be returned.

trans-unit.source: This function can be called in a loop to query the number of bytes download or to pause until a download is complete.

seg-source.mrk: This function can be called in a loop to query the number of bytes download or to pause until a download is complete.

target.mrk: This function can be called in a loop to query the number of bytes download or to pause until a download is complete.

trans-unit.source: Example

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: Save the downloaded file to the temporary folder.

seg-source.mrk: Save the downloaded file to the temporary folder.

target.mrk: Save the downloaded file to the temporary folder.

trans-unit.source: Download the file in the background with the selected option of 'force a reload from the remote site.'

seg-source.mrk: Download the file in the background with the selected option of 'force a reload from the remote site.'

target.mrk: Download the file in the background with the selected option of 'force a reload from the remote site.'

trans-unit.source: http://www.autoitscript.com/autoit3/files/beta/update.dat

seg-source.mrk: http://www.autoitscript.com/autoit3/files/beta/update.dat

target.mrk: http://www.autoitscript.com/autoit3/files/beta/update.dat

trans-unit.source: Wait for the download to complete by monitoring when the 2nd index value of InetGetInfo returns True.

seg-source.mrk: Wait for the download to complete by monitoring when the 2nd index value of InetGetInfo returns True.

target.mrk: Wait for the download to complete by monitoring when the 2nd index value of InetGetInfo returns True.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve details about the download file.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve details about the download file.

target.mrk: Retrieve details about the download file.

trans-unit.source: If an error occurred then return from the function and delete the file.

seg-source.mrk: If an error occurred then return from the function and delete the file.

target.mrk: If an error occurred then return from the function and delete the file.

trans-unit.source: Close the handle returned by InetGet.

seg-source.mrk: Close the handle returned by InetGet.

target.mrk: Close the handle returned by InetGet.

trans-unit.source: Display details about the downloaded file.

target.mrk: Display details about the downloaded file.
